name: Karman Line
description:
*** Please note that this build is not an actual game. I am only testing a very small part of the plans I have for the game (the pilot aspect). Overall, it's just me having fun in game dev and sharing it with friends. ***

How do you think people travel between wormholes in space ?

They take a cab... and that's you. 

You drive a cab....in space. Avoid asteroids and use gravity to get speed, save fuel and make your customers happy.
